CustomField.formula: Owner:User.FirstName &" "&Owner:User.LastName & IF( ISBLANK(Project_Supporter_1__c ) , "", ", "&Project_Supporter_1__r.FirstName&" "& Project_Supporter_1__r.LastName) & IF( ISBLANK(Project_Supporter_2__c ) , "", ", "&Project_Supporter_2__r.FirstName&" "& Project_Supporter_2__r.LastName) & IF( ISBLANK(Project_Supporter_3__c ) , "", ", "&Project_Supporter_3__r.FirstName&" "& Project_Supporter_3__r.LastName) & IF( ISBLANK(Project_Supporter_4__c ) , "", ", "&Project_Supporter_4__r.FirstName&" "& Project_Supporter_4__r.LastName)
CustomField.label: Project Owner/Suporters
